screen.welcome.description.text: We're glad to have you on board. Your ID verification is in progress and you can check the status in the profile section of the app.
form.confirm.first-name.error.text: Please enter a valid first name
form.confirm.last-name.error.text: Please enter a valid last name
form.confirm.password.error.text: Please enter a valid 8 character long password
success.CODE_SENT.text: Please check your inbox, we have just sent a reset code link to the email address associated with your account.
error.SERVER_ERROR.text: Sorry we are not able to process your request Please try again later
error.AUTH_FAILED.text: Your email and password combination does not match an existing account
error.ACCOUNT_NOT_CPROCESS.text: Sorry we are not able to process your request Please try again later
screen.login.paragraph.text: Log in to manage your deliveries, track progress, and ensure timely arrivals. Your efficient delivery experience starts here.
screen.login.no-account.text: Don't have an account? Create one!
screen.register.paragraph.text: Create an account to start managing your deliveries efficiently. Enjoy optimized routes, real-time updates, and seamless delivery management.
screen.register.form.terms-privacy-01.te: By registering, you confirm that you accept our
screen.confirm-email.paragraph.text: To ensure the security of our platform, please provide your phone number and take a photo of your valid ID to verify your identity and protect your account.
screen.forgot_password.paragraph.text: Enter your email below to receive a password reset code and get back to managing deliveries and tracking progress, and ensuring timely arrivals.
screen.new_password.paragraph.text: Enter your password reset code with your new password and get back to managing deliveries and tracking progress, and ensuring timely arrivals.
